paper_abstract: A method for obtaining rigorous upper and lower bounds on an Output of the exact weak solution of the three-dimensional Stokes problem is described. Recently bounds for the exact Outputs of interest have been obtained for both the Poisson equation and the advection-diffusion-reaction equation. In this work, we extend this approach to the Stokes problem where a novel formulation of the method also leads to a simpler flux calculation based on the directly equilibrated flux method. To illustrate this technique, bounds on the flowrate are calculated for an incompressible creeping flow driven by a pressure gradient in an endless square channel with an array of rectangular obstacles in the center. Copyright (C) 2009 John Wiley & Sons, Ltd.
paper_title: Bounds on outputs of the exact weak solution of the three-dimensional Stokes problem
